name: tiny-di
description: A tini tiny dependency injection container for node/io.js applications

scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build && npm test
scripts.test: typings install && npm run prepare-spec && istanbul cover jasmine && npm run clean-spec
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.prepare-spec: cd spec && copyfiles **/*.spec.js *.spec.js ../buildspec && cd .. && tsc -p tsconfig.spec.json

author: Dennis Saenger <npm15@mail.ds82.de>
